did.abstract: Papers of Alfred H. Colquitt and of his father, Walter Terry Colquitt, U.S. Congressman, including a letter by Walter concerning politics and the upcoming presidential election (1844), a letter by Alfred Colquitt to C.C. Jones, Jr., discussing his address on the New South, and an invitation from Alfred Colquitt to others regarding the laying of a cornerstone of Memorial Hall in Atlanta.
